fullForm: National Council for Hotel Management Joint Entrance Examination
eligibility: Passed 10+2 system of Senior Secondary examination or its equivalent with English as one of the subjects. Candidates must have passed English as a subject of study (core/elective/functional) in the qualifying examination. Those appearing in 10+2 or equivalent examination can also appear on a provisional basis.
negativeMarking: 1 mark will be deducted for each incorrect answer except for the Aptitude for Service Sector section, where graded marking is used.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for NCHMCT JEE?
faqs.answer: Candidates who have passed 10+2 or equivalent examination with English as one of the subjects are eligible to apply. Those appearing in the qualifying examination can also apply on a provisional basis.
